Name: Nightstalk
Allegiance: Autobot
Gender:  Male
Age:  Unknown
Function:  Berserker

Profile: Once one of Optimus Prime's most passive
troops under the codename of First Aid, a freakish and
horrifying attack by Sunstorm and the mayhem squad not
only traumatised him, but removed every inch of his
sanity, resulting in him becoming a berserker,
pathalogically existing for ine purpose- the ruthless
murder of every Decepticon in existence and their
decendants.  Not long after the incident which forever
removed his compassion, he volunteered for not only
the great upgrade, but also an upgrade on his systems
and left the Protectobots, instead requesting
frontline combat- he increased his armour and
firepower, and had Perceptor add a special ability in
him, the ability to temporarily absorb any weapon or
device into himself, along with arming himself with a
series of vibroclaws that tear apart armour with the
same efficiency as Transmetal 2 talons, along with a
left wrist mounted electro disruptor, overloads any
electronic equipment it hits, and a right wrist
mounted null ray.  

Most Autobots looked at it positively, seeing First
Aid as gaining his nerve.  Optimus viewed it
cautiously worried that this course of action might
result in an even greater horror. However, he trusted
in First Aid's entrenched pacifism to intrinsitacally
remain, so allowed the upgrade. It was during the
first mission where First Aid was on the front line
against a group of Decepticons that to everyone's
horro, the once compassionate doctor had become an
unstopable killing machine. If it were cold blooded
murder then the autobots might have possibly been able
to handle it, however, what they saw was a
frightening, malicious killer who seemed to delight in
giving his victims a violent torturous death before
extinguishing their sparks by crushing their spark
containment chambers then shredding their sparks.  

Horrified at this turn of events, the Autobots were
faced with no choice but to place him in stasis- an
act which cemented great animosity towards his fellow
Autobots in his heart. In a similar vein to Protoform
X, he was meant to be dumped stasis pod and all on a
fbarren world where it was hoped he would be unable to
harm another living thing. However, he was jetisoned
along with all the other pods aboard the Axalon during
crash landing. Amazingly his pod survived a crash
landing and lay dormant underground, albeit affected
by the quantum surge and changed into a transmetal. 

His scanners picking up the form of a Tasmanian Devil,
and donning the name Nightstalk, he awoke as a
sadistic berserker, estranged from his fellow maximals
and driven my the malevolent wish to eradicate all
Predicons from existence.

Abilities: Nightstalk is one bot prepped for mainframe
combat as cheetor would put it.  His beast mode is
equipped with great speed and agility while being
armed with energon teeth and claws identical to the
retractable ones he uses in robot mode. His transmetal
mode is a jet where he is armed with all three of his
weapons. His favorite tactic in this mode is to use
full powered shots from his electro disruptor to short
out an oponent's engines and send them carreening to
their death. These three vmodes in combination make
him  a dangerous foe to all Predacons.

Weaknesses: Nightstalk's insanity is a double edged
sword, while it works liek an adrenhaline facvotr, in
the sense that short of blowing off a limb, most pain
indicing damage he'll merely shrug off, it also makes
him hostile towards his comrades, headstrong when
logic would dictate pulling out or avoiding conflict
and pretty likely to get himself in stasis lock long
after a wiser bot would have withdrawn.

Strength: 9
Intelligence: 6
Speed: 8
Endurance: 10
Rank: 1
Courage: 10
Firepower: 7
Skill: 7
